did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Say Let Me Tell You Something by George W. Harvey as Told to George Olin 1952
did.abstract: Typescript (carbon) reminiscences of life as a miner and prospector in Alaska, Canada, and later in Arizona from about 1914-1950. As told to George Olin by George W. Harvey.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript (carbon) reminiscences of life as a miner and prospector in Alaska, Canada, and later in Arizona from about 1914-1950.
